answerText: The Old Man and the Sea[10] In this memoir, Hemingway discusses his relationships with authors like James Joyce and F. Scott Fitzgerald during their time in Paris.
heading: ACF Regionals |2012 | Maryland A + Chicago B | 18 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Identify these works of Ernest Hemingway, for 10 points each: [10] In this novel, Santiago discusses Joe Dimaggio with the boy Manolin before going to sea for 85 days and catching a large marlin, which is devoured by sharks.
